Key Arguments: The Bill is seen as a threat to freedom of speech and expression.
Misinformation and disinformation are subjective terms that can be misused.
Individuals should have access to all information to form their own opinions.
The government itself has spread misinformation, as exemplified by COVID-19 vaccine claims.
Notable Quotes: This Bill is dangerous and a direct attack on my freedom of speech and freedom of expression.
In a healthy democracy no small group should have the power to silence individuals or groups especially using the terms Misinformation and Disinformation.
It is my right to have access to all information and points of view so that I can form my own opinions.
